portfolio.title: Gothic CRM
portfolio.description: Full Create, Read, Update, and Delete (CRUD) functionality with colors that change dynamically upon status updates. Database: AstraDB. Styled with Dracula UI

portfolio.title: Contacts
portfolio.description: This is a simple Python and React CRUD app with real backend using SQLAlchemy. It allows you to Create Read Update and Delete contacts. Styled with Tailwind CSS

portfolio.title: Notes App / Todo App
portfolio.description: This is a React Notes app that uses localStorage to save items. This one has been deployed and you can find a link for it on my Github. Styled with Dracula UI
